import { Component } from "@angular/core"; @Component({ selector: 'app-cantantes-cantante', templateUrl: './cantante.component.html' }) export class CantantesComponent{ public name:string = 'Kurt Cobain' public age:number = 29; get getName():string{ return this.name.toUpperCase(); } public cambiarNombre():void{ this.name = 'Freddy Mercury'; } public cambiarEdad():void{ this.age = 56; } }
